subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: After nearly three weeks, numerous doping scandals, two team withdrawals and plenty of ill feelings, the Tour de France heads into the final time trial on Saturday as a still-undecided race.
snippet: After nearly three weeks, numerous doping scandals, two team withdrawals and plenty of ill feelings, the Tour de France heads into the final time trial on Saturday as a still-undecided race.
